title: Fuckmybeatz: Nightlife in Frankfurt (2012)
storyline: Fuckmybeatz - nightlife in Frankfurt discovers the extra ordinary party line made by DJ Leonardo Aquino. The documentary explains the generation party in Germany and is full of up-tempo house music. Fuckmybeatz was a limited party zone with sex, drugs and club music.
synopsis: The party series "fuckmybeatz" was one of the hottest events in Frankfurt city for years. Only a selected group may attend these events, which are known for their excessive and raucous parties. It was more than just celebration, for most of the member it turnt into a family-like community. To be seen is everything! Who is not on the guestlist dont need to appear. Searching for happiness and passion the so-called "members" start their journey in a parallel world in which music, sex and drugs override all social norms. But what happens when the party is over?The film "fuckmybeatz" accompanied the organizer and DJ Leonardo Aquino on a trip across the night life of Frankfurt and talks about the hedonism of the people who celebrate their passion and their escape from reality. A merciless portrait of the generation Party.
